string.name: enable_sync_message
string.translation_description: The dialog message asking the user if he wants to enable sync with Google Drive.

resources.string: Do you want to sync your tracks with Google Drive? This will allow you to view your tracks in Google Drive, share tracks via Google Drive, and view tracks shared with you. All tracks synced to Google Drive will be private by default.

string.name: enable_sync_title
string.translation_description: The dialog title asking the user if he wants to enable sync with Google Drive.

string.name: eula_accept
string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of Service' dialog, the button to accept.

string.name: eula_body
string.translation_description:
The body in the 'Terms of Service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.
%1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: By using Google\'s mobile products and services (“Services”), you agree to be bound by a) the YouTube Terms of Use (%1$s/tos_youtube) for YouTube-related Services, b) the Google Maps Terms and Conditions (%1$s/tos_maps) for mapping, local and location-based Services, c) the Google Books Terms of Service (%1$s/tos_books) for Books-related Services, and d) the Google Terms of Service (%1$s/utos) for all other Services, as updated from time to time.

string.name: eula_copyright_year
string.translation_description: The copyright year in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. \u00A9 is the unicode value for the copyright symbol.

string.name: eula_date
string.translation_description: The date in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

string.name: eula_decline
string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of Service' dialog, the button to decline.

string.name: eula_footer
string.translation_description:
The footer in the 'Terms of Service'. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.
%1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: Any required attribution or notice for the third party content may be found at %1$s/legalnotices.

string.name: eula_title
string.translation_description: The title for the 'Terms of Service' dialog.

string.name: external_storage_not_available
string.translation_description: Error message when the external storage is not available.

string.name: external_storage_not_writable
string.translation_description: Error message when the external storage is not writable.

string.name: files_few
string.translation_description:
The phrase for 'few' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'small' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals
%1$d an integer number. The number is a small number.

string.name: files_many
string.translation_description:
The phrase for 'many' files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'large' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals
%1$d an integer number. The number is a large number.

string.name: files_one
string.translation_description: The phrase for 1 file. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like one. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: files_other
string.translation_description:
The phrase for 'other' files. This is used when the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese). See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals
%1$d an integer number.

string.name: files_two
string.translation_description: The phrase for 2 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like two. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: files_zero
string.translation_description: The phrase for 0 files. This is used when the language requires special treatment of the number 0. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: gps_google_location_settings
string.translation_description: In Android, the Google location settings to modify location settings for all Google applications. See Settings -> Google -> Location settings.

string.name: gps_location_access
string.translation_description: In Android, the location access settings to modify location settings for all applications. See Settings -> Location access.

string.name: gps_disabled
string.translation_description:
In the main view, the message on the top asking the user to enable GPS.
%1$s location settings. E.g., 'Google location settings'.

resources.string: GPS not enabled. Tap here to go to %1$s. Press the back button to return.

string.name: gps_not_found
string.translation_description: On application start, message when there is no GPS on the device.

resources.string: No GPS is found on the device.

string.name: gps_starting
string.translation_description: The message when starting GPS.

string.name: gps_stopping
string.translation_description: The message when stopping GPS.

string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top indicating My Tracks is waiting for a better GPS signal.

resources.string: Waiting for a better GPS signal.

string.name: gps_wait_for_signal
string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top indicating My Tracks is waiting for GPS signal.

string.name: help_about
string.translation_description: In the 'Help' page, the button on the bottom to open the 'About My Tracks' dialog.

string.name: icon_application
string.translation_description: When sharing a track, we display a list of Android applications on the device that can be used. This is the generic accessibility description for any application icon.

string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the 'Marker' icon.

string.name: icon_my_location
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the 'My Location' icon.

string.name: icon_pause_recording
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the pause recording icon.

string.name: icon_record_track
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the record track icon.

string.name: icon_stop_recording
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the stop recording icon.

string.name: icon_track
string.translation_description: The accessibility description for the 'Track' icon.

string.name: import_error
string.translation_description:
When importing from the external storage, the error message indicating that only some of the files are imported.
%1$d the number of files successfully imported. E.g., '2'. %2$s the number of files in the directory. E.g., '2 files'. %3$s the directory. E.g., '/storage/sdcard0/MyTracks/gpx/'.

string.name: import_no_directory
string.translation_description:
When importing from the external storage, the error message when the directory doesn't exist.
%1$s: the directory. E.g., '/storage/sdcard0/MyTracks/gpx/'.

string.name: import_progress_message
string.translation_description:
When importing from the external storage, the progress message.
%1$s: the directory. E.g., '/storage/sdcard0/MyTracks/gpx/'.

string.name: import_success
string.translation_description:
When importing from the external storage, the success message.
%1$s the number of files. E.g., '2 files'. %2$s the directory. E.g., '/storage/sdcard0/MyTracks/gpx/'.

string.name: maps_list_error
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the text on the Maps' list page informing the user that his maps cannot be loaded at this time.

resources.string: Your maps could not be loaded at this time.

string.name: maps_list_no_maps
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the text on the 'Maps' list page informing the user that he doesn't have any maps.

string.name: maps_list_progress_message
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the progress message informing the user that his maps are being loaded.

string.name: maps_list_public_label
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, in the 'Maps' list page, the label next to the maps that are public, as opposed to being unlisted.

string.name: maps_list_title
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the title of the page asking the user to pick a map.

string.name: maps_list_unlisted_label
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, in the 'Maps' list page, the label next to the maps that are unlisted, as opposed to being public.

string.name: marker_add_error
string.translation_description: When adding a marker, the message indicating error due to no GPS signal.

resources.string: Unable to insert a marker. No GPS signal. Try again.

string.name: marker_add_success
string.translation_description: When adding a marker, the message indicating success.

string.name: marker_delete_one_marker_confirm_message
string.translation_description: When deleting a marker, the confirmation dialog message informing the user that the marker will be permanently deleted from the device.

resources.string: The marker will be permanently deleted from the device.

string.name: marker_label_end
string.translation_description:
When inserting a marker to indicate the end of a track, the marker's name. E.g., 'track_name (End)'.
%1$s track name. E.g., 'track_name'.

string.name: marker_label_start
string.translation_description:
When inserting a marker to indicate the start of a track, the marker's name. E.g., 'track_name (Start)'.
%1$s track name. E.g., 'track_name'.

string.name: marker_name_format
string.translation_description:
When adding a marker, the string format for the default name.
%1$d: number. E.g., '1'.

string.name: marker_split_name_format
string.translation_description:
When adding a split marker, the string format for the default name.
%1$d: number. E.g., '1'.

string.name: marker_detail_statistics_title
string.translation_description: In the marker detail page, the title for the statistics section indicating that the data below are since the last split marker.

string.name: marker_detail_waypoint_marker_type

In the marker detail page, the label for the marker type.
%1$s marker type. E.g., 'building'.

string.translation_description: In the marker edit page, the label for the marker type, including an example.

string.translation_description: In the marker edit page, the hint in the marker type text field when it is empty.

string.name: marker_list_empty_message
string.translation_description: The message when the marker list is empty.

string.name: tracks_few
string.translation_description:
The phrase for 'few' tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'small' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals
%1$d an integer number. The number is a small number.

string.name: tracks_many
string.translation_description:
The phrase for 'many' tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of 'large' numbers. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals
%1$d an integer number. The number is a large number.

string.name: tracks_one
string.translation_description: The phrase for 1 track. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like one. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: tracks_other
string.translation_description:
The phrase for 'other' tracks. This is used when the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese). See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals
%1$d an integer number.

string.name: tracks_two
string.translation_description: The phrase for 2 tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of numbers like two. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.name: tracks_zero
string.translation_description: The phrase for 0 tracks. This is used when the language requires special treatment of the number 0. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html#Plurals

string.translation_description:
For the voice announcement, the template to make an announcement.
%1$s: distance string. E.g., '2.2 kilometers'. %2$s: time string. E.g., '20 minutes 1 second'. %3$s: speed/pace string. E.g., '2.2 miles per hour' for speed and '30 minutes 1 second per kilometer' for pace.

string.name: voice_total_distance_kilometers_few
string.translation_description:
For voice announcement, to say total distance 'few' kilometers.
%1$.2f a float number. The number is a small number.

string.name: voice_total_distance_kilometers_many
string.translation_description:
For voice announcement, to say total distance 'many' kilometers.
%1$.2f a float number. The number is a large number.

string.name: voice_total_distance_kilometers_one
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say total distance 1 kilometer.

string.name: voice_total_distance_kilometers_other
string.translation_description:
For voice announcement, to say total distance 'other' kilometers, 'other' means for cases that the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity.
%1$.2f a float number.

string.name: voice_total_distance_kilometers_two
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say total distance 2 kilometers.

string.name: voice_total_distance_kilometers_zero
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say total distance 0 kilometers.

string.name: voice_total_distance_miles_few
string.translation_description:
For voice announcement, to say total distance 'few' miles.
%1$.2f a float number. The number is a small number.

string.name: voice_total_distance_miles_many
string.translation_description:
For voice announcement, to say total distance 'many' miles.
%1$.2f a float number. The number is a large number.

string.name: voice_total_distance_miles_one
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say total distance 1 mile.

string.name: voice_total_distance_miles_other
string.translation_description:
For voice announcement, to say total distance 'other' miles, 'other' means for cases that the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity.
%1$.2f a float number.

string.name: voice_total_distance_miles_two
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say total distance 2 miles.

string.name: voice_total_distance_miles_zero
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say total distance 0 miles.

string.name: voice_total_distance_zero
string.translation_description: For the voice announcement, the announcement when the current track's total distance is zero.

string.name: welcome_message
string.translation_description: The message of the welcome dialog. Note that \n is the newline character.

resources.string:
Welcome to My Tracks. Use this app to record your GPS tracks, aggregate your stats over time, and share your paths with friends.

Happy Exploring,
The My Tracks Team

string.name: welcome_title
string.translation_description: The title of the welcome dialog.

string.name: stats_grade
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' page, the grade. Grade is the amount of inclination to the horizontal, also known as slope or incline.

string.name: stats_min
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' page, the minimum of a value.

string.name: stats_max
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' page, the maximum of a value.

string.name: stats_gain
string.translation_description: In the 'Stats' page, the gain of a value. E.g, gain in elevation.

resources.string:
"Endomondo is a sports tracking app that makes exercising more fun.
Tap to log in, add your friends and follow their sports activities in real-time."
Press the update button to see what your friends have been doing lately.
检测到你跳转到错误页面，这是因为新浪微博第三方认证服务器出错，多次重复操作依然不行的话尝试换网络，四次元无能为力
请注意，根据新浪微博的平台政策，刚添加的帐号会在 %s 天后过期，到时需要重新登录，在授权过期之前重复登陆不会刷新剩余天数

返回帐号管理页面，重新授权

没有多余帐号可供切换

1. 搜索、私信、个人资料编辑都没接口做
 2. 受新浪微博政策限制，帐号隔3个月就会过期，需要重新登录
 3. 登录是在新浪网站上进行的，登录不了找新浪
 4. Flyme 和 Miui 这2个系统的问题都不解决 5. 没适配到平板，不推荐5寸+设备使用这个应用 6. 觉得不爽就老老实实用官方客户端
新浪微博某些网络节点又出故障，换个网络试试

只适用大图模式，加快图片获取速度
关键词只针对内容，不会误伤到微博的用户昵称，但@到的用户昵称如果匹配会被过滤，而用户只针对发微博/转发微博的用户昵称，是不涉及内容中@到的用户。
